metamorphosis.book.chapter.title: </item;minecraft:writable_book/>Patch Notes
metamorphosis.book.page.text.catcher: You’ve heard of acid, haven’t you? Now you shall take it. Grow a Fluid Extractor, and lure the living close. When it bites, it drinks — drawing life from their veins. The process is... Exquisite. Painful for them, perhaps. But necessary. Be warned: some creatures are too strong to be captured by our devices. Those beasts resist the pull — you will not take them easily</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/catcher_from_chamber/>
metamorphosis.book.page.text.chamber: Now... the Chamber. You cannot simply build it. Nothing of ours is built — it is grown. The Chamber is the heart of creation. Through it, the Swarm expands. Without it, you are nothing. To grow one, you’ll need this: </recipe;minecraft:crafting_shaped;metamorphosis:multiblock_morpher/>But remember, this will be the last thing you can obtain the human way. From now on — everything must be grown. Drop the required matter onto the Morpher, and it will take shape. Do not interrupt the process... It screams when disturbed. Curious what’s needed? Good. You’ll need: </item;metamorphosis:flesh/> x 21</item;metamorphosis:norphed_dirt_stair_0/> x 1</item;metamorphosis:norphed_dirt_stair_0/> x 1</item;metamorphosis:norphed_dirt_stair_0/> x 1</item;metamorphosis:norphed_dirt_stair_0/> x 1
metamorphosis.book.page.text.crusher: You’ve learned to feed. Now, learn to break. The Crusher — it grinds, tears, reduces. From cold ore, it makes dust. From hard matter, it makes food for the Swarm </recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/crusher_from_chamber/>Simple, but vital. Every scream of stone becomes a whisper of progress
metamorphosis.book.page.text.flesh: The first thing you must understand, little one, is flesh. Everything begins with flesh. It is the seed of life — and of us. Harvest it from the living. Tear it from Zombies, Villagers, Horses… all bodies serve. Each will give you </item;metamorphosis:flesh_piece/>Gather enough, and you may compress the pieces into a single, pulsating mass. Use this method: </recipe;minecraft:crafting_shaped;minecraft:flesh/>The Swarm is built from flesh. Remember that
metamorphosis.book.page.text.fluid_trans: Ah... So you’ve finally reached this stage. Good. Now you will learn how to let our essence flow — how to spread fluids through the veins of the Swarm without touching them yourself.For this, you must grow a Fluid Transmitter. Place it... Connect the storage to the desired organ — and then, watch. The flow will begin on its own, like blood through flesh. No pipes. No hands. Only life moving life </recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/fluid_transmitter_from_chamber/>To link two different blocks, use the Manipulator while sneaking. First select the block from which you want to transfer fluids, then select the block to which the fluid should be transferred. After that, stop sneaking and use the Manipulator on the transmitter
metamorphosis.book.page.text.forge: Even the Swarm needs heat. Our Forge burns without fire, consumes without flame. It melts ores, cooks flesh, and does so faster than your crude furnaces</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/forge_from_chamber/>It needs no fuel — only biomass. Add acid or adrenaline, and the process quickens, pulsing like a heart in rage. And should you desire more — evolution awaits. Feed it this: </item;metamorphosis:forge_upgrade/>How to find it? Heh... The Swarm rewards those who dig deep enough
metamorphosis.book.page.text.manipulator: Remember this, young one: without a proper tool, you are nothing but soft flesh. To shape, to repair, to open and to bind — you need the Manipulator. It is simple... yet irreplaceable. Fine tendrils, hardened claws, stiff cartilage — everything in it is crafted for precise, delicate work. Humans use a ‘screwdriver’ for such tasks. We possess something far more refined. The Manipulator is an extension of your will. Through it you build the Swarm... and keep it alive. But be aware: every block responds to touch in its own unique way. If you wish to learn how the Manipulator interacts with a specific structure — consult the guide page of that block</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/wrench_from_chamber/>
metamorphosis.book.page.text.norph_sourc: The next thing you must learn is Norph — the living ground beneath us. Norph is the membrane between our world and theirs. Through it, we draw resources, power, and life itself. But remember this well — our structures live only upon Norph. Without it, they cannot breathe, cannot grow. Norph can be born only from a Source. Craft one like this: </recipe;minecraft:crafting_shaped;metamorphosis:norph_source/>Place it, and the Norph will spread on its own... slowly, hungrily. Watch as the world turns alive
metamorphosis.book.page.text.squeezer: Hunger gnaws at all of us, young one. If you wish to feed — you must learn to harvest. The only way to nourish the Swarm is to grow a Squeezer. It accepts any organic matter... and crushes it, crushes it, until nothing remains but rich, flowing biomass. As long as it drips — we live. As long as you feed it — the Swarm stays strong</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/squeezer_from_chamber/>
metamorphosis.book.page.text.stomach: To feed the Swarm, you must grow a Organic Reprocessor. It consumes meat, breaks it down, and births acid — pure life matter. Feed it flesh, and it will pulse. Feed it acid and adrenaline, and it will roar, devouring faster, stronger</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/stomach_from_chamber/>Everything that enters becomes part of us
metamorphosis.book.page.text.storages: To grow within the Chamber, you’ll need resources — flesh, fluids, essence. They must be stored, contained, like organs within a body. Use these to shape our vessels: </recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/fluid_storage_from_chamber/>and</recipe;metamorphosis:chamber;metamorphosis:chamber/chest_from_chamber/>Each will serve as part of the Swarm’s anatomy — one holds fluids, the other, matter
metamorphosis.book.page.text.v003:
• Added 2 new decorative blocks
• Fixed wrong model on Norphed Dirt
• Adjusted Infestor Size
metamorphosis.book.page.text.v004:
• Finally fixed decorative hive sound
• Roof block now spread normally
• Removed 2 step sounds. They was too loud
• Changed Hive sound frequency. Early it was too rare
• Added Queen Guard
• Added Worker
• Added Eggs Block
• Start Working under Swarm Village
metamorphosis.book.page.text.v005:
• First version of village generation
• A bit reworked multiblocks, now it's can have voxel shape of original block, but I still want more. Fully custom voxel shape will be top. And get rid from blockState to itemStack
metamorphosis.book.page.text.v006:
• Small internal changes and filled up book
• Fixed entities not attacked and crash by missing sound.
• A bit changed descriptions in book
• A bit nerfed Queen Guard. He was have too much armor
metamorphosis.book.page.text.v007:
• Renamed lymph into acid 
• Changed recipes to work with float values of fluids
• Added Squeezer
